sayings: Okay, Yivo showed us a good time. No one's denying that, but shklee hasn't offered our universe any kind of commitment, and we're 14 billion years old - That is too old to play the field.
If McNeal wishes to be taken seriously why does she not simply tear the judge's head off?
My weight is appropriate and attractive.
One of these days Ndnd, bang, zoom, straight to the third moon of Omicron Persei 8!
This concept of 'wuv' confuses and infuriates us!
I think there was something funny in that hippie.
I AM LRRR, RULER OF THE PLANET OMICRON PERSEI 8! May I crash on your couch?
